attributes.action: reverse the desiction on the red arrows olympic air display
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: are we to be ashamed to be british or to show ower patrenidge? next we will be banned from flying our national flag so as not to offend. please reverse this desiction. I feel these STUPID desictons do more to damage this country than any terrarist.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
